title: Design Thinking-Based Educational Escape Room (EER) Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Design Concepts and Experience with VR Simulations
context.additional_context: Escape game development project for social studies education applying learner-centered design principles

learning_goals: Learners can complete the EER design process by utilizing the five stages of design thinking (Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test).
Learners can design at least three social studies-linked puzzles that promote collaborative problem-solving in a VR environment.
Learners can systematically validate EER experiences by developing an assessment rubric that measures learning effectiveness.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
